label: Theme
examples:
If you would like to use you own CSS for Spotlight Search, have a look at the included CSS file "apexspotlight.css" and override the classes e.g. with Theme Roller.
Example:

/* APEX Spotlight Search Orange Theme */
.apx-Spotlight-result-orange.is-active .apx-Spotlight-link {
  background-color: #f59e33;
  color: #fff;
}

.apx-Spotlight-icon-orange {
  background-color: #79787e;
  color: #fff;
}
helpText:
Choose the Spotlight Search theme which best matches your current UI

Possible options:
- Standard: Should be used in most cases, fits very well to Vita theme of UT
- Orange: Orange list entries with white font and grey icons
- Red: Red list entries with white font and light grey icons, fits well to Vita Red theme of UT

- Dark: Dark grey list entries with white font and light grey icons, fits well to Vita Dark theme of UT
